title: Crushed beans on toast
ingredients: ['4 cloves garlic', '5 tablespoons olive oil', 'Handful of flat-leaved parsley', 'Salt and black pepper', '400g (14oz) canned butter beans, drained and rinsed', '1 small onion, finely chopped', '1 bay leaf', '2-3 teaspoons fresh thyme leaves', '2 slices of bread, tomato flavoured (optional), toasted']
